name: Satin Bella Adjustable sleep mask - Marielle -  in Lilac
description:
A gorgeous silvery lilac satin vintage-inspired sleepmask with flourishes of  brocade-like dark violet flowers. Bordered by black pleated satin ribbon with an adjustable lingerie elastic strap. Adorned with two small bows on the front.

The interior is a blend of cotton and bamboo making the mask super comfortable, soft and hypoallergenic. 

The Satin Bella collection comes in a satin  drawstring bag, ideal for storing your sleep mask and/or other lingerie items.

*************************************************************

**Please note:

♥ THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER - PLEASE ALLOW UP TO THREE WEEKS FOR PRODUCTION BEFORE SHIPPING. 
It is then shipped by registered mail with shipping times varying from country to country.

name: Let me eat cupcake  sleepmask in Kawaii Cotton -  Lolita
description:
Cupcakes galore! This collection is part of the Lolita Sleep mask collection. Adorable 100% Japanese Kawaii cotton. There is also a glittery sheen on the cotton making this fabric very unique. A sleep mask, eyemask for a deliriously romantic sleep.

- Finished with two bows on the front.

- The back of the eye mask is asoft and luxurious Bamboo jersey, ensuring no light enters.

- There is an adjustable elastic strap at the back for ALL size heads.

- The masks are padded with bamboo cotton to ensure comfort as well as to keep away unwanted light.


Inspired by all that is Burlesque, sultry vintage and pinup, these are one of a kind eye masks that are luxurious, sensuous and sexy.

MADE TO ORDER

**Please note:


♥♥ THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER - PLEASE ALLOW UP TO THREE WEEKS FOR PRODUCTION BEFORE SHIPPING.
It is then shipped with shipping times varying from country to country.

name: silk sleepmask "horses" ideal for men - unisex by Love Me sugar
Extra long tassel earplugs in teal or black
description:
A little extra in length, these extra long  Tasselled earplugs are inspired from icon Audrey Hepburn, adding a little glamor to your ears while you sleep. Ear lingerie while you sleep. The tassel some down approximately to your shoulders.

Choose from these colors:


 -  black
 - Teal 

The tassels are handmade.

Tassel earplugs come in a black organza bag, gift wrapped in tissue paper and shipped with tracking.

                        ------------------------------

Earplugs specifications:

These tassels are long and measure approx 8cm in length.
These can be cut if you feel they are too long.

32 decibels (NRR 32dB)
Ultra soft comfort foam
Material: Polyurethane foam

How To Use Earplugs
1.With clean hands roll plug into a tight, crease free cylinder.
2. with opposite hand pull up and back on outer ear to straighen ear canal.
3.Quickly insert earplug well into the ear canal and hold in place until it expands for a comfortable, secure fit
WARNING: improper fitting will reduce effectiveness, which could result in hearing loss or injury.

Care: Store your reusable earplugs in the organza bag to keep them clean and increase longevity. Discard earplugs when dirt and wax begin accumulating on earplugs.


Sellers note: As an everyday user of earplugs these earplugs are great for muting loud sounds. BUT If you sleep next to a heavy snorer or someone with sleep apnea (like me) this will not block them out completely! It will merely lessen the sound


**This item is made to order with production taking up to 3 weeks, not including shipping delay.
**Shipping times vary from country to country. 
**Please read our policies on shipment.

name: Vintage green or bright green tassel earplugs inspired by Holly Golightly
description:
Breakfast at Tiffanys vintage inspired long tassel earplugs adds a touch of glamor while sleeping or resting.  These are really cute and make fabulous presents for brides, hen's parties or Breakfast at Tiffany inspired parties. I like to call it Ear lingerie while you sleep.

Choose from:

 - Vintage green tassel earplugs
 - bright green tassel earplugs

The tassels are handmade.

Tassel earplugs come in a black organza bag, gift wrapped in tissue paper and shipped with tracking.

                        ------------------------------

Earplugs specifications:

These tassels are long and measure approx 8cm in length.
These can be cut if you feel they are too long.

32 decibels (NRR 32dB)
Ultra soft comfort foam
Material: Polyurethane foam

How To Use Earplugs
1.With clean hands roll plug into a tight, crease free cylinder.
2. with opposite hand pull up and back on outer ear to straighen ear canal.
3.Quickly insert earplug well into the ear canal and hold in place until it expands for a comfortable, secure fit

WARNING: improper fitting will reduce effectiveness, which could result in hearing loss or injury.
Earplugs should be disposed of within 4-6 months.

Care: Store your reusable earplugs in the organza bag to keep them clean and increase longevity. Discard earplugs when dirt and wax begin accumulating on earplugs.


Sellers note: As an everyday user of earplugs these earplugs are great for muting loud sounds. BUT If you sleep next to a heavy snorer or someone with sleep apnea (like me) this will not block them out completely! It will merely lessen the sound


**Please note:

*This item is made to order with production taking up to 3 weeks, not including shipping delay.
*Shipping times vary from country to country. 
*Please read our policies on shipment.

2. with opposite hand pull up and back on outer ear to straighen ear canal.

WARNING: improper fitting will reduce effectiveness, which could result in hearing loss or injury.

Care: Store your reusable earplugs in the organza bag to keep them clean and increase longevity. Discard earplugs when dirt and wax begin accumulating on earplugs.


Sellers note: As an everyday user of earplugs these earplugs are great for muting loud sounds. BUT If you sleep next to a heavy snorer or someone with sleep apnea (like me) this will not block them out completely! It will merely lessen the sound.

name: MARIETTE sleep mask in Chocolate and gold with gold bows
description:
The Sensuous color of chocolate with with rich gold in this satin sleep mask "Mariette". The eye mask is finished with pleated gold double satin ribbon. There are also two adorable bows on the front.

The back of the eye mask is black satin, ensuring no light enters.

There is an adjustable elastic strap at the back for ALL size heads.

The masks are padded with 4 layers of bamboo cotton wadding to ensure comfort as well as to keep away unwanted light. 


***************************

*Production time takes approximately 2-3 weeks with shipping times varying from country to country. Items are shipped by registered mail.

Please contact me first for rush orders.

name: Hot pink striped sleep mask in satin and bows
description:
A sleep mask for summer afternoon siestas, or if you want to bring summer to your sleep, this Burlesque sleep mask in hot pink soft satin stripes is finished with hot pink double satin box pleat ribbon.  Two adorable bows on the front of the eye mask. Lightly padded with bamboo/cotton wadding, very soft and comes with a fully adjustable lingerie elastic band with gold hardware for all size heads. Sweet dreams in retro style.

************************************************

* Please note this item is made to order and can take 2-3 weeks production time. Shipping times vary from country to country.

name: Sleep mask in yellow Nautical stripes in satin 'Marguerite'
description:
Summer lovin' The color of sunshine and summer! The 'Marguerite' sleep mask comes in yellow satin sailor stripes with double satin pleated ribbon.

There are also two adorable bows on the front. Comes lightly padded with cotton bamboo wadding which makes it very soft. The fully adjustable lingerie elastic band in gold hardware fits all size heads. Sweet dreams to divas everywhere!

** Please note this item is made to order and can take 2-3 weeks production time. Shipping times vary from country to country.

name: 'Paris Paris'  sleep mask in pink silk with Eiffel Tower and pink satin  trim
description:
Adding a little bit more to the simple version of the 'Paris 'Paris' sleep mask this version adds a little more frou frou. The 'Paris Paris'  pink silk mask has the Eiffel tower printed sporadically. Adorned on the front are dusky pink satin bows.  Pink pleated satin ribbon trim completes the adornment. The wadding is several layers of cotton/bamboo making it hypoallergenic and soft.  Pink satin ribbon ties as well as an adjustable flocked elastic strap are fitted to tie around all size heads.

Due to the placement of the Eiffel Tower on the fabric each sleep mask is created uniquely and placement will be different for each each mask. 


This sleep mask has been designed and carefully crafted by hand. The silk print Eiffel Tower is a limited edition fabric.

All masks come in a satin drawstring storage bag.



*Production time takes approximately 2-3 weeks with shipping times varying from country to country. Items are shipped  by registered mail. 

Model: Lisa Natalie
Photographer: Natalie Vella

description:

The  'Chacenay' is part of the new collection of classy sleep masks inspired by the chateaux of France. Black ribbon ties as well as an adjustable flocked elastic strap are fitted to tie around all size heads.

This sleep mask has been designed and carefully crafted by hand.

All masks come in a satin drawstring storage bag.



*Production time takes approximately 2-3 weeks with shipping times varying from country to country. Items are shipped  by registered mail. 

Model: Claire Conan-Vrinat

description:

Part of the new collection inspired by the chateaux of France. Burgandy silk ribbon ties as well as an adjustable flocked elastic strap are fitted to tie around all size heads.

name: Baby pink silk sleeping mask  "Burlesque Burlesque" with Swarovski
description:
The baby pink "Burlesque Burlesque"  Silk Dupioni sleep mask is made with glamor and comfort in mind. The back comes in a delicious silk charmeuse which is soft on your eyes. Ruffled spotted tulle adds a burlesque flourish.

Details:
Venice lace is appliqued with a dangling clear Swarovski Crystal. The mask is recommended for a very special occasion! 

The sleep mask comes fully adjustable with flocked lingerie elastic finished in gold lingerie hardware. This is very sturdy and lasts alot longer than flimsy elastic. Also attached is black satin ribbon to tie around your head if you want to use it as a blindfold. The sleep mask comes lightly padded with bamboo/cotton wadding.

***************************************************************

*Production time takes approximately 2-3 weeks with shipping times varying from country to country. Items are shipped  by registered mail.

The Satin Bella collection comes with a satin bag, ideal for storing your sleep mask and/or other lingerie items.

*************************************************************

*Production time takes approximately 2-3 weeks with shipping times varying from country to country. Items are shipped  by registered mail.
